articles.title: Best Skin-Tightening Cream? Shoppers and Testers Say This Is It
articles.author: Izzy Baskette
articles.summary: Summer Fridays has introduced the Rich Cushion Cream Ultra Plumping Moisturizer, a vegan and cruelty-free product designed to hydrate, smooth, and rejuvenate the skin. The moisturizer, priced at $52, features ingredients like glycerin, squalane, watermelon rind, and coastal plants, aiming to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Estée Lauder and Olay also have skin tightening creams.

articles.title: Coca-Cola rival shares wild new Amazon partnership
articles.author: Barbara Bellesi Zito
articles.summary: Olipop is launching a PR campaign by releasing limited-edition VIP boxes through Amazon Ads, containing their popular soda flavors and other summer-related items. These boxes will be available on June 30 for five cents each, aiming to engage everyday consumers instead of just influencers and promote their product through unboxing videos.

articles.title: Trump's T1 phone says it's "proudly American" with "American values" - but it won't be US made
articles.author: The Critical Mind
articles.summary: Trump Mobile is launching the T1 Phone 8002, which was initially advertised as "MADE IN THE USA" but now has revised marketing claims. Purism also has Liberty phone which is a $1,999 version of Purism's Made-in-China Librem 5, which retails for $799.

articles.title: Review: Anastasia Beverly Hills launches Hydra Prime SPF 50
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Anastasia Beverly Hills is launching Hydra Prime SPF 50, a sunscreen designed to offer skincare benefits and serve as a makeup primer. The product aims to hydrate, strengthen the skin's barrier, smooth texture, prime makeup, and improve overall skin appearance, featuring ingredients like niacinamide and ectoin.

articles.title: 34 Problem-Solving Products That Do Their Jobs Well
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption, Mise En Scene launched Perfect Serum for hair hydration, and The Pink Stuff released a new Sqeezy sponge set for cleaning. Additionally, Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, and Catrice released Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener.

articles.title: LUYUAN Group Upgrades International Brand Strategy to Advance Active Mobility Solutions for All Scenarios  Jun. 26, 2025 22:31
articles.summary: LUYUAN Group is upgrading its brand strategy with focus on technological innovation introducing features like liquid-cooled power system, a battery digital care system, and an intelligent connectivity system to models like the S95. The company will expand into international markets with brands LUYUAN and LYVA, which integrates cutting-edge technologies like liquid-cooled mid-drive motors and AI-driven controls.

articles.title: Get Ready: Prime Day 2025 Is Bigger, Smarter, and Just Days Away
articles.summary: Amazon is rolling out Rufus, an AI-powered shopping assistant, for Prime Day. Rufus, originally introduced in early 2024, lives in the Amazon app and helps users find trending deals, compare products, and answer questions in real-time. Amazon is also introducing 'Today's Deals Drops' featuring limited-time offers on spotlighted products from top brands.

articles.title: [NFOGRAPHIC] Samsung Z Series: Leadership through constant innovation
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z series, featuring the Fold and Flip formats, has transformed the smartphone market with its foldable technology. The latest generation integrates AI to enhance connected living. Samsung is preparing to launch a new 'Ultra experience'.

articles.title: I tried the new M&S strawberry sandwich – it's delicious & different but you'll only buy it once
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: M&S has launched the Red Diamond Strawberries & Creme Sandwich, a limited-edition dessert sandwich priced at £2.80. The sandwich combines British Red Diamond Strawberries with whipped cream cheese and crème fraîche, drawing inspiration from Japanese cream-filled sandwiches and Wimbledon's strawberries and cream. Initial reviews are mixed, with praise for the strawberry component and criticism for the bread.

articles.title: Look like a video pro without breaking a sweat with this AI-powered editor
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Canvid AI-Powered Video Creator & Editor is launched as an all-in-one video creation studio that simplifies recording and editing. The product offers features like AI voice enhancement, auto-generated captions, background removal, smooth motion, smart zooms, cinematic effects, and crystal-clear audio. A lifetime subscription, working on up to three devices with two years of updates and 50GB storage, is available for $59.99.

articles.title: Google Doppl: Try On Clothes Virtually
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google has launched Doppl, an experimental app that utilizes AI for virtual try-ons, allowing users to visualize themselves in different outfits. The app, available on iOS and Android in the United States, enables users to upload outfit images and create AI-generated videos to preview how the outfit would look.

articles.title: Google launches Doppl, a new app that lets you visualize how an outfit might look on you
articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.summary: Google is launching a new experimental app called Doppl, available on iOS and Android in the U.S., which uses AI to visualize how different outfits might look on the user. The app allows users to virtually try on outfits on a digital version of themselves by uploading a full-body photo and then using photos or screenshots of outfits. Doppl can create images and AI-generated videos of the user wearing the outfit and also allows users to save and share their favorite looks.

articles.title: Micron Elevates PC Performance, Unveils Adaptive Write Technology and G9 QLC NAND  Jun. 26, 2025 21:01
articles.summary: Micron Technology has launched the Micron 2600 NVMe SSD, a value client storage solution for OEMs featuring 9th-generation QLC NAND and Adaptive Write Technology. The 2600 SSD delivers up to 63% faster sequential write and 49% faster random write speeds than competing value QLC and TLC SSDs and is now shipping to OEMs globally in various form factors and capacities.

articles.title: Best EOFY 2025 Deals in Australia: Huge Sales from Down Under
articles.author: Jessica Smith
articles.summary: Several companies are offering discounts on their products and services for the End of Financial Year (EOFY) sales.  Examples include Dyson offering discounts on vacuum cleaners and Samsung offering discounts on OLED TVs and Galaxy products.  Other companies participating include Koala, Nespresso, Ergoflex, BodyBlendz, and many more, providing a wide range of deals for consumers.

articles.title: Lanka IOC unveils Servo Futura NXT
articles.summary: Lanka IOC PLC has launched Servo Futura NXT, a new generation of high-performance petrol engine oil designed for petrol and hybrid engines. Servo Futura NXT is now available at Lanka IOC retail outlets and authorized Servo distributors island-wide. It aims to enhance engine efficiency, durability, fuel economy, and engine longevity.

articles.title: TOZO Announces Exclusive Prime Day Deals on Intelligent Wearable Products
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: TOZO announced its participation in Amazon Prime Day 2025 with discounts on products, including the TOZO S7 and S5 smartwatches, along with the TOZO PM1 wearable speaker. The S7 and S5 smartwatches offer features like health tracking and Bluetooth calling, while the PM1 speaker provides enhanced audio and water resistance. These deals are available on the TOZO website and Amazon store.

articles.title: Dyson Airwrap I.D. review: Did the smart styler outsmart my frizz?
articles.author: Holly J Coley
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap i.d., a new iteration of the Dyson Airwrap Multi-styler Tool that uses air instead of heat to style hair. The Airwrap i.d. is a smart styler that can automatically adjust heat and air flow based on the user's hair needs and has a real-time LCD to review heat settings. It also has multiple attachments, offering styling versatility.

articles.title: Hollowed Out
articles.author: Tyler Durden
articles.summary: Charles Hugh Smith launched a new book titled "Ultra-Processed Life." The book is available at a 25% discount (ebook edition) and 19% discount (print edition) through Friday, June 27.

articles.title: Closer teams, faster results, lower costs: How GenAI helps companies scale effectively
articles.summary: Adobe introduced new AI-powered features, including Product Support Agent and Data Insights Agent, within its Experience Platform to help teams work more effectively. Adobe also launched Adobe AI Platform including, Adobe Experience Platform Agent Orchestrator, Adobe Brand Concierge, Adobe GenStudio, and Adobe Firefly Services to enhance customer experience orchestration and content creation. These introductions are aimed at improving personalization, efficiency, and reducing costs for businesses.

articles.title: YouTube's newest Premium perk: more AI clutter
articles.author: engadget
articles.summary: YouTube is introducing a new AI-generated carousel feature powered by Google's AI to its search functionality. This feature, available in the US, presents a series of relevant videos that play sequentially, offering 'useful insights' related to the user's search query within the YouTube app.

articles.title: Dunkin'® and Sabrina Carpenter Reunite for Strawberry Daydream Refresher
articles.author: Source Staff
articles.summary: Dunkin' has launched Sabrina's Strawberry Daydream Refresher, a new iced, creamy beverage featuring sweet strawberry flavor, creamy oatmilk, and a cloud of cold foam. It is available as a $3 medium for Dunkin' Rewards members. To promote the drink, Dunkin' partnered with Nadia Lee Cohen for an ad campaign featuring Sabrina Carpenter as a 'Daydream Matchmaker'.

articles.title: YouTube Tests Expanded AI Discovery, Broadens Access to its In-Stream Chatbot
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: YouTube is adding new AI-powered search results to guide user discovery within the app, offering a carousel of related videos based on search queries. Additionally, YouTube is expanding access to its in-stream AI chatbot tool to non-Premium subscribers in the U.S., allowing users to ask questions about videos and explore topics in more depth.

articles.title: New Balance Has Another Wild Hybrid Sneaker Coming
articles.summary: New Balance is preparing to launch a new hybrid sneaker, the 1890. The design of the 1890 draws inspiration from Wallabee and running shoe styles, featuring snakeskin overlays and a black sole. The retail debut of the new model is expected within the next year.

articles.title: Geek Bar Pulse X Vape Review: Performance Breakdown
articles.summary: Geek Bar has launched the Pulse X vape, a disposable device known for its design and features. It features high-quality flavor, vapor production with dual mesh coils, long battery life, quick charging, and multiple nicotine strength options. BettyVape sells the Geek Bar Pulse X.

articles.title: Mountain Dew Unveils Two Exclusive New Flavors
articles.author: Evan Paul
articles.summary: Mountain Dew is introducing new summer flavors. The new flavors are intended to evoke childhood memories and tropical vibes.

articles.title: More than 100 shoppers line up for Aldi's grand opening, as grocer opens its second S.I. location
articles.author: Jessica Jones-Gorman
articles.summary: Aldi opened a new store location in New Dorp, Staten Island, with a grand opening event featuring gift card giveaways. The new location aims to provide Staten Island residents with easier access to quality groceries at affordable prices. Grand opening events continued throughout the weekend with a sweepstakes for a $500 Aldi gift card.

articles.title: NewsOut LLC Signs 10-Year Broadcast Deal with New to The Street - $500K Annually for Unlimited Global Media Distribution
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: NewsOut LLC and New to The Street have entered a 10-year strategic media distribution agreement. NewsOut will pay $500,000 annually for broadcast rights and media distribution through New to The Street's platform. NewsOut will serve as the exclusive news partner for New to The Street's annual clients, producing video news content and delivering market updates.

articles.title: EBY's Latest Campaign Features Rosario Dawson as the Face of Their Intimates Line
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: EBY launched the Pain-Free T-Shirt Bra, featuring Rosario Dawson as the face of the campaign. This new bra uses a patented Smart Silicon Tec, offering a wire-free, comfortable alternative to traditional underwire bras and is available in sizes XS-2XLDD. EBY aims to challenge the status quo of uncomfortable bras and support women globally through microloans with every purchase.

articles.title: Indacloud Unveils Top Premium THCA Flower Line
articles.author: SERVD Distribution
articles.summary: SERVD Distribution's Parent Company announced that Indacloud launched a new lineup of THCA flower products. This range includes five selections focused on high-quality and innovation in wellness products. The Indacloud range is tailored for individuals seeking a refined and premium experience.

articles.title: Finally! These AI smart glasses are giving me a feature I've been desperate for the Meta Ray-Bans to get since launch
articles.author: Hamish Hector
articles.summary: Xiaomi has announced its AI glasses, offering features similar to Meta's smart glasses but with upgrades like electrochromic dimming and USB-C charging on the arm. The glasses boast a 12MP camera, built-in microphones, open ear speakers, and an AI assistant, and the electrochromic dimming allows users to manually control lens shading.

articles.title: Would you watch your shows on a TinyTV?
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: TinyCircuits offers the TinyTV 2, a miniature television with functional remote and dials. It costs $60 and is also available in a transparent version.

articles.title: YouTube Is Getting Two New Smart Features
articles.author: Jorge A. Aguilar
articles.summary: YouTube is introducing new AI-powered tools, including an AI-driven search results carousel and a wider release of its conversational AI feature (powered by Gemini). The conversational AI feature, initially for Premium members, will expand to non-Premium users in the US and provide video summaries and suggestions. The AI-powered search results carousel, currently for YouTube Premium subscribers in the US, recommends videos with short clips and descriptions for searches related to shopping, travel, or activities in a certain area.

articles.title: Rollick Unveils Significant Traction and Enhancements to RollickNurture Product
articles.author: Rollick
articles.summary: Rollick announced significant enhancements to its RollickNurture product to maximize consumer engagement and drive sales. The new functionality provides dealers and OEMs with advanced nurturing capabilities.

articles.title: Now Google's Gemini AI is ready to fill in those empty cells in your spreadsheet
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google is launching a new AI function called Google Gemini in Sheets. This feature will generate text, summarize information, or categorize data by referencing specific cells in the spreadsheet.

articles.title: Deck Commerce Launches AI-Powered Delivery Promise, Powered by Deck IQ™
articles.author: Deck Commerce
articles.summary: Deck Commerce launched Delivery Promise, a new AI-driven feature to provide retailers with accurate delivery dates for online shopping, powered by Deck IQ™. This new product increases add-to-cart conversions, lifts revenue, and reduces cart abandonment.

articles.title: Baemin joins morning delivery race with 'Early Opening' as competition heats up
articles.author: HWANG SOO-YEON
articles.summary: Woowa Brothers, the operator of Baemin, is expanding its 'Early Opening' early-morning delivery service to eight locations nationwide, offering delivery of goods starting at 6 a.m. Naver is also preparing to launch its own dawn delivery service later this year. This expansion and planned launch reflect the intensifying competition in Korea's early morning delivery market.

articles.title: 如何合理运用空间与层次感提升穿搭的视觉效果_手机网易网
articles.author: 张同学要加油
articles.summary: Volkswagen officially unveiled the ID.Every1 concept car, which will be produced on the MEB platform with a new software architecture. The car is expected to launch in 2027 with an estimated price of 20,000 euros. The concept car features a distinctive design, including a continuous black grille and unique interior elements like a removable Bluetooth speaker.

articles.title: 学会运用图案与色彩来改善你的穿搭风格_手机网易网
articles.author: 张同学要加油
articles.summary: Volkswagen officially launched the ID.Every1 concept car, which will be produced on the MEB platform and is the first Volkswagen model to use a new software architecture. The car is expected to be available in 2027, with an estimated price of 20,000 euros.

articles.title: I'm Predicting Record-Low Kindle Prices on Amazon Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Madison McGee
articles.summary: Amazon has released the Kindle Colorsoft, their first color e-reader, which features a glare-free display, long-lasting battery, and waterproof design. They've also revamped the popular Paperwhite and Paperwhite Signature editions, offering features like adjustable warm light, wireless charging, and increased storage. Additionally, Kindle Unlimited offers subscribers unlimited reading and listening from a library of over 4 million books.

articles.title: The Hidden Power of Product Animation in Boosting Online Conversions
articles.author: Gavin Walker
articles.summary: Renderly specializes in creating product animations to showcase a product's features and benefits in a visually compelling way. They offer services to help companies launch new products, enhance existing products, and even bring prototypes to life before production using 3D animation. The goal is to create engaging visuals that drive conversions and build brand identity.

articles.title: McDonald's newest menu item is the Daily Double cheeseburger
articles.author: Mike Snider
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing the Daily Double burger nationwide, featuring two beef patties, cheese, lettuce, onions, mayo, and tomato. It will be available through 2025 and will be included in the McValue Meal Deal starting July 22, alongside Chicken McNuggets, fries, and a drink. The burger is also appearing in the McDonald's app, where customers can find deals.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new ‘daily double' menu item available now – but it's about to get cheaper next month
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new menu item called the Daily Double burger nationwide. The Daily Double features two beef patties, American cheese, lettuce, onions, mayonnaise, and tomato slices. It will also be available at a discounted price next month.

articles.title: 32 Must-Haves For Anyone Planning To Basically Live Outdoors All Summer
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The content highlights the launch of several new or promoted products suited for summer activities. Naturium introduced a cooling gel body wash, Neutrogena promoted their oil-free sunscreen body mist with SPF 70, and Liquid I.V. featured their Firecracker-flavored electrolyte drink mix, all intended to enhance the summer experience.

articles.title: Google Quietly Launches New App to Run AI Models Directly on Your Device
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Google launched its new AI Edge Gallery app, allowing users to run AI models like Gemma 3n locally on smartphones. This new app prioritizes user privacy by eliminating the need for cloud connectivity, transforming phones into mini AI labs.

articles.title: What is an Xbox?
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft is working with AMD to co-engineer chips for its next-generation Xbox console and other devices, aiming to create a unified gaming experience across consoles, handhelds, PCs, and the cloud. This includes maintaining compatibility with the existing Xbox game library and offering hardware support for backward compatibility through a potential emulation solution on Windows, as part of the 'Xbox PC' initiative to compete with Steam.

articles.title: Google Handoff could finally fix the Android experience across multiple devices
articles.summary: Google is testing a new feature called "Handoff" within Google Play Services. This feature aims to allow users to seamlessly continue apps, media, and notifications across multiple Android devices. Handoff could be available to all Android devices that run these core services.

articles.title: Gorgeous Lips, Less than 500: Best Matt Lipsticks
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Lakme introduces Absolute Matte Melt Mini Liquid Lip Color with a lightweight, travel-friendly formula. SUGAR Cosmetics launches Glide Peptide Serum Lipstick combining color and lip care with lip-nourishing peptides. HUDACRUSH offers a 6-Piece Liquid Matte Nude Lipstick Set with six nude shades for variety. Lakmé also releases Cushion Matte Lipstick with a hydrating cushion formula.

articles.title: YouTube AI Overviews: Shopping & Local Search for Premium Users
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: YouTube launched a new AI Overviews-like search carousel on June 26, 2025, designed to enhance content discovery for YouTube Premium subscribers in the United States. This AI-driven feature provides summarized and relevant search results, initially focusing on shopping, local destinations, and activities, aiming to improve search efficiency and the user experience.

articles.title: Dyson V12 vacuum that's 'powerful and easy to manoeuvre' gets £190 price slash
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V12 Detect Slim Absolute Vacuum at a discounted price of £399.99, with an additional 10% off for newsletter subscribers. The vacuum features strong suction, a Motorbar cleaner head, 60 minutes of battery life, and automatic hair detangling. Amazon is offering the VYTRONIX 3-in-1 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner at discounted price of £59.99.

articles.title: New Look's 'perfect' £32 midi dress is 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look has introduced the Green Striped Puffed Sleeve Midi Dress, priced at £32.39 (originally £35.99), available in sizes 8 to 16 and in green, cream and red colors. The midi dress is designed with a comfortable woven fabric, a square neck, puffed sleeves, side pockets and a relaxed fit and is receiving positive reviews from customers as a summer staple.

articles.title: Next's £18 'effortlessly chic' dress is 'perfect for the hot weather' in five colours
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is offering the '100% Cotton V-Neck Jersey Mini Summer Dress' for £18. The dress features a V-neck, tiered skirt, and comes in five colors, with positive customer reviews highlighting its comfort and suitability for warm weather.

articles.title: Xiaomi unveils first SUV, the YU7, priced from 253,500 yuan
articles.author: jianli@jiemian.com
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the YU7, its first sport utility vehicle, priced at 253,500 yuan (US$34,900). The YU7 has a claimed range of 835km, 690PS peak horsepower, and 0–100km/h acceleration in 3.23 seconds.

articles.title: Trader Joe's shoppers go crazy over $5.99 lip mask dupe – it's similar to Laneige but almost $20 cheaper
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has launched a new watermelon-flavored lip mask for $5.99, marketed as a more affordable alternative to Laneige's lip mask. This lip mask contains shea butter, coconut oil, vitamin E, and watermelon seed oil. Trader Joe's also brought back Brazil Nut Body Butter, described as a dupe of Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream.

articles.title: Beef bowl chain Yoshinoya to offer noodles in Japan to attract more female customers
articles.summary: Yoshinoya is launching its first noodle dish, 'gyutama stamina mazesoba,' on July 4 for the summer season. The dish includes Chinese noodles, stewed beef, egg, and other toppings. The company aims to attract more customers, especially women and families, and expects to sell two million servings.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz's electrified G-Wagon unveiled in Malaysia, prices start at RM959,000
articles.author: Nabiha Safian
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz Malaysia has introduced the all-new G 580 with EQ Technology, an electric version of the iconic G-Class. The G 580 features individual-wheel drive with four motors, delivering 432 kW (587 hp) and 1,164 Nm of torque, enabling features like G-Turn and G-Steering. Priced from RM958,888, the SUV offers a range of up to 473 kilometers and fast charging capabilities, also available is an exclusive Edition One variant starting from RM998,888.

articles.title: Verizon announces alarming plan to prevent more angry customers
articles.author: Patricia Battle
articles.summary: Verizon is introducing a new service leveraging Google Cloud's AI to provide personalized customer service. The AI aims to resolve customer issues effectively, provide updates through the My Verizon app, text, or callbacks, and offer 24/7 access to live agents and chat support. This initiative is designed to enhance customer experience and streamline issue resolution.

articles.title: The AI Marketing Playbook: How To Leverage AI For Smarter Campaigns
articles.author: Medhat Zaki
articles.summary: Spotify has launched an AI-powered feature for creating playlists based on user text descriptions. Sephora's AI chatbot offers makeup appointment booking and purchasing assistance.  Several AI tools and platforms like Google Ads Smart Bidding, The Trade Desk, Optimizely, Google Analytics AI, IBM Watson, HubSpot, Mailchimp, Salesforce Einstein, Canva Magic Design and Jasper are being used for programmatic ads, A/B testing, predictive analytics, email segmentation and content optimization.

articles.title: M&S unveils brand-new ‘dessert sandwich'
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has launched a new product, the 'Strawberry & Creme sandwich', a limited-edition dessert sandwich inspired by Japanese 'fruit sando'. The sandwich features Red Diamond strawberries and whipped cream cheese on sweetened bread and is available for £2.60 at M&S Foodhall's across the UK.

articles.title: New Lidl Cyprus campaign honours island's terrain, local producers
articles.author: Lidl Cyprus
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus has launched its new summer campaign, 'Truly Fresh at Lidl,' which promotes freshness through cinematic aesthetics and authentic experiences. The campaign showcases the quality of Lidl's produce and their investment in local production, with 57% of produce sourced from Cypriot suppliers. Lidl Cyprus also won the Best Buy Award in the 'Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Department' category from ICERTIAS.

articles.title: Cawston Press to make TV advertising debut this summer
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Cawston Press is launching its first TV campaign to promote its sparkling sodas, featuring a 10-second spot during Channel 4's Great British Bake Off: The Professionals. This campaign aims to increase brand awareness and reach a wider UK audience for Cawston Press' sparkling canned range, which includes flavors like Rhubarb and Cloudy Apple.

articles.title: Summer's Looking Sweet at Baskin-Robbins as Sydney Sweeney Launches Exclusive Sweet on Sydney Menu
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Baskin-Robbins is launching the Sweet on Sydney Menu, a limited-time offering co-created with Sydney Sweeney, starting July 1. The menu features Sydney's Signature Scoop, Rainbow Sherbet in a chocolate-dipped waffle cone, and Sydney's Signature Fizz, a Rainbow Sherbet and STARRY™ lemon lime soda blend served in a collectable cup.

articles.title: 37 Affordable Swaps That Live Up To The Hype
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of several affordable alternative products from various companies. These include E.l.f.'s Poreless Putty Primer and Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen, Nyx's Fat Oil Lip Drip and setting spray, Renpho percussion massager, Govee neon rope light, Essence's Lash Princess Mascara, and L'Oreal's Lumi Glotion,Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer,TruSkin vitamin C serum, Skin1004's skin-lifting face masks, Elizavecca hair treatment, CeraVe's Retinol Serum, Overmont cast-iron Dutch oven, Briotech topical skin spray,BestLand's lipsticks, Pavoi's hoop earrings and Peripera lip tint .These items are presented as budget-friendly options comparable to higher-end brands.

articles.title: My Sweat Was Like a Slip-in-Slide for Foundation—Until I Met This $48 SPF-Primer Hybrid
articles.author: Samantha Holender
articles.summary: Anastasia Beverly Hills has launched Hydra Prime SPF 50, a sunscreen and primer hybrid. The product promises 16 hours of wear, performs well under makeup, provides a glowy finish, and controls oil. It is designed for daily use under makeup rather than for prolonged sun exposure.

articles.title: Introducing Mood Pan, an All-in-One Handpan and Meditation Gadget
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Roland introduced the Mood Pan on June 24, a high-tech handpan with nine pads that can be set to different musical scales. It features 12 styles and 8 tones, with more tones downloadable via the Mood Pan Plus app. The Mood Pan is available for preorder from Sweetwater and will ship in July.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils 2025 Bespoke AI Appliances in India; Debuts Innovative Bespoke AI Laundry Combo
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 Bespoke AI appliance lineup in India, featuring the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, a space-saving all-in-one washing machine with AI Wash & Dry technology, and other appliances such as the Bespoke AI WindFree Air Conditioner and refrigerators. The Bespoke AI Laundry Combo is priced at INR 319000 and is available across online and offline retail channels.

articles.title: TikTok's Latest AI Tool stuns creators and its just the beginning!
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: TikTok, owned by ByteDance, has launched a new AI-powered feature that allows users to generate short videos automatically using text or images. This feature, designed for both businesses and general users, simplifies the creation of engaging video content. TikTok aims to differentiate itself by offering fast and user-friendly content creation tools.

articles.title: Lidl Cyprus redefines freshness, investing in authenticity and locality
articles.author: Bdigital Web Solutions
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus launched 'Truly Fresh at Lidl', a new summer campaign promoting freshness through cinematic visuals and authentic Cypriot experiences. The campaign redefines freshness communication using subjective shots and food styling to highlight product quality and Cypriot origins. Lidl Cyprus also emphasizes its investment in local production, sourcing 57% of its groceries from Cypriot suppliers.

articles.title: Amaze and Picsart Partner to Turn Picsart Designs into Physical and Digital Products That Can Be Sold Globally
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amaze Software and Picsart have partnered to allow Picsart's 150 million users to create physical and digital merchandise within the Picsart app. This new capability unlocks new e-commerce opportunities for Picsart users.

articles.title: Here's How Much a $1000 Investment in Synopsys Made 10 Years Ago Would Be Worth Today
articles.summary: Synopsys benefits from solid design wins due to its robust product portfolio. The increasing hybrid work trend is fueling bandwidth demand, and Synopsys' Fusion Compiler product's strong traction boosts the company's top line. The growing demand for advanced technology, design, IP, and security solutions creates promising opportunities for Synopsys.

articles.title: Amaze and Picsart Partner to Turn Picsart Designs into Physical and Digital Products That Can Be Sold Globally
articles.author: Amaze Holdings Inc.
articles.summary: Amaze Software has partnered with Picsart to allow Picsart users to create and sell physical merchandise within the Picsart app. This integration enables users to transform digital art into products like hoodies and tote bags, with integrated selling experiences for platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Twitch. The integration is powered by Amaze's integrated commerce and global supply chain solutions.

articles.title: The latest gadgets to gear you up for summer
articles.author: Camille Macawili
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, featuring mobile AI and a 200MP wide lens. Ray-Ban launched Meta AI Sunglasses with hands-free capabilities. Sony unveiled the WH-1000XM6 Wireless Headphones, featuring intelligent noise cancellation. Rolls-Royce presented a bespoke Chess Set, and Mercedes-AMG released the F1 W14 E Performance Model LEGO set. Jacquemus launched The Pétanque Set, and Giobagnara x Poltrona Frau introduced Maple and Walnut Rackets.

articles.title: AWS launches Innovation Hub to empower cloud and AI innovation in Asia-Pacific
articles.author: Bich Thuy from Singapore
articles.summary: AWS launched its first AWS Innovation Hub in Singapore to accelerate digital and AI transformation for organizations across Asia-Pacific.  Additionally, AWS and Digital Industry Singapore (DISG) launched AI Springboard to empower Singapore-based enterprises to scale AI across their operations. Westcon-Comstor also expanded its distribution agreement with AWS to Vietnam.

articles.title: L'Oréal has just revealed what the future of beauty will look like – here's a sneak peek
articles.author: Mia Lyndon
articles.summary: L'Oréal is launching several new AI-powered beauty apps like Noli and Spotscan+ Coach to help consumers find the right products and skincare routines.  Additionally, L'Oréal is introducing innovative technologies such as Osmobloom for perfume extraction and Airlight Pro hairdryer in collaboration with Zuvi.  Lancôme and YSL are also set to release new products like the Nano-resurfacer and YSL Hyper Look Studio, respectively, enhancing skincare and makeup experiences.

articles.title: L'Oréal has just revealed what the future of beauty will look like – here's a sneak peek
articles.author: Mia Lyndon
articles.summary: L'Oréal is launching the Noli app, a platform that offers personalized skincare and hair product recommendations. L'Oréal is also introducing Osmobloom, a new technology for extracting perfume oils from plants without heat or solvents, which is being used in Valentino's Anatomy of Dreams collection. Additionally, L'Oréal is releasing the Airlight Pro hairdryer, developed with Zuvi, which uses infrared light to dry hair faster and with less damage, while Lancôme is launching Nano-resurfacer, a handheld tool for at-home skin resurfacing. YSL will introduce Hyper Look Studio, a virtual try-on experience for makeup trends.

articles.title: Up to 300 S'pore firms stand to get cloud credits, grants to spur AI trials ...
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: AWS announced the AI Springboard programme at the launch of its new Innovation Hub.

articles.title: 30 Useful And Affordable Products
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. The Pink Stuff introduced a new Sqeezy sponge set for cleaning various messes. Garnier Fructis launched Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum, while E.l.f. released the moisturizing "Squeeze Me" lip balm.

articles.title: Intellect launches PF Cloud, World's First Open Business Impact AI Platform, Purple Fabric on Cloud at GIFT City
articles.summary: Intellect Design Arena Ltd. launched Purple Fabric, an Open Business Impact AI Platform on PF Cloud, designed to enable enterprises to shift from AI experimentation to measurable business impact.  Hosted within GIFT City's IFSC, PF Cloud is a cloud-native infrastructure designed for secure and compliant AI innovation, offering a robust foundation for institutions seeking to operate across borders while ensuring adherence to local data and governance mandates.

articles.title: Balancing AI automation with authentic engagement in the GCC
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: Braze assists GCC brands in leveraging AI for customer engagement while maintaining authenticity. Majid Al Futtaim Holding, a Braze customer, utilized the Braze platform to accelerate the launch of automated campaigns, executing over one thousand unique communications and reaching over 5.5 million recipients.

articles.title: Logitech G's Streamlabs Launches New Sponsorship Platform to Connect Brands and Streamers
articles.author: Praveen
articles.summary: Streamlabs, a Logitech G company, launched Streamlabs Sponsorships, a new platform that connects streamers with brands. The launch campaigns will have $0 platform fees, and 100% of the brand payout will go directly to the streamers. This new service is available to all Streamlabs users and aims to provide streamers of all sizes with direct access to brand partnerships.

articles.title: Wildfire Loyalty Platform First to Enable Users to Earn Cashback and Rewards on AI-Assisted Shopping
articles.author: Polk County Itemiser-Observer
articles.summary: Publishers, fintechs, and loyalty providers can now monetize AI-generated product suggestions with a new capability. This new capability introduces a service that benefits different companies.

articles.title: Fresh-fruit ‘dessert sandwiches' aren't an abomination – they have a long and delicious history
articles.author: Xanthe Clay
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new strawberry and 'creme' sandwich inspired by Japanese sweet 'sando'. This product aims to combine Asian aesthetics with a British sandwich but faces challenges related to freshness and shelf life, addressed by ingredient tweaking.

articles.title: Shoppers are raving about a 'game changing' £9 deodorant from Amazon that stops excessive sweating
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Perspi-Guard Antiperspirant Roll-On Deodorant, designed for hyperhidrosis, is available on Amazon for £9 and is praised for preventing excessive sweating and odor. Users highlight its effectiveness in restoring confidence and preventing sweat patches, with one bottle lasting up to three months.

articles.title: Fairphone 6 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fairphone officially announced the Fairphone 6 on June 25, 2025. This 5G-ready smartphone features a removable Li-Ion 4415 mAh battery with 30W wired and 5W reverse wired charging, a 6.31 inches LTPO OLED display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor, and a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel wide lens. The phone runs on Android 15 and comes with 8GB RAM and 256GB internal storage.

articles.title: From meal deals to bacon alfredo: How Gousto made me a person who cooks
articles.summary: Gousto, a UK-based meal delivery service, has launched in Ireland. The service provides pre-portioned ingredients and easy-to-follow recipes delivered to customers' doors, simplifying the cooking process and offering a convenient solution for busy individuals. The reviewer highlighted the freshness of the ingredients, the ease of preparation, and the overall positive experience with Gousto.

articles.title: Nextech3D.ai Signs New Enterprise Contract For Volume AI-Driven 3D Model Production
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Nextech3D.ai has signed a new enterprise contract to produce 5,000 AI-generated 3D models. The 3D models are valued at $150,000 and are to be delivered within 60 days, scaling up the production to meet growing global demand from retailers and eCommerce platforms.

articles.title: Is There Anything One Can Do to Make a Sleeper Sofa More Comfortable?
articles.author: Amelia Jerden
articles.summary: Custom Mattress Factory offers custom-made sleeper-sofa mattresses with various materials like pocketed coils, memory foam, latex, or plant-based CustomFoam, costing between $500 and $1,000. Meliusly provides a sleeper-sofa support board that improves the feel of the mattress and can be folded up for storage, as tested and positively reviewed by a user.

articles.title: Fashion & Beauty: Your summer glow starts with these SPF essentials
articles.author: Jennifer Cox
articles.summary: Cle de Peau launched UV Protective Emulsion for Body SPF 60, UV Protective Cream for Face SPF 50+, and UV Protective Lip Treatment SPF 25. Glow Recipe introduced Watermelon Glow Dewy Defense SPF 30 Hydrating Sunscreen. Shiseido launched Urban Environment Mineral Clear SPF 50+ and Clear Sunscreen Stick SPF50, and Burt's Bees released Sensitive Solutions SPF 30 Gentle Hydrating Day Lotion and Tinted Lip Balm, SPF 30 Sienna Rose.

articles.title: Born for Switch – AGI Technology Launches High-Speed microSD Express Card TF338
articles.author: AGI Technology Co.
articles.summary: AGI has launched the TF338 microSD Express card, built on the microSD Express standard and powered by the PCIe Gen3 x1 interface with NVMe protocol, to support the new storage standard adopted by Nintendo Switch 2. The TF338 delivers up to 800MB/s read and 700MB/s write speeds, offering significantly faster performance than traditional microSD cards and making it suitable for high-performance gaming and mobile content creation.

articles.title: Lilly to launch Mounjaro pen in India to compete with Novo's weight-loss drug Wegovy
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk launched Wegovy in India on Tuesday. The product is available in multiple dose strengths and features an 'easy-to-use' pen device.

articles.title: BlockDAG Is Building Before the Buzz: Inside the $600M Ecosystem
articles.summary: BlockDAG has launched its testnet, enabling developers to launch smart contracts, build dApps using a no-code tool, and test the network. Additionally, BlockDAG provides a no-code smart contract tool that allows non-developers to easily build and launch contracts, expanding accessibility and utility of the platform. They have developer grants that are live to encourage development.

articles.title: Telecom firm hailed for boosting digital inclusion in Tabora
articles.author: Media News Company
articles.summary: Telecommunications firm Yas launched a new service center in Tabora, as part of its national expansion strategy. The center offers SIM registration, digital financial services via Mixx by Yas, sales of smart devices like routers and Simujanja smartphones, and support for small businesses. This launch aligns with Yas's commitment to inclusive digital growth and its rebranding from Tigo and Tigo Pesa to Yas and Mixx by Yas.

articles.title: Next's new 'fabulous' puff ball dress that's 'perfect for holidays'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has launched the new Lipsy Puff Ball Dress, a crisp white cotton mini dress with a V-neck and short sleeves, priced at £59. It is available in sizes six to 18 and is described as perfect for holidays and can be dressed up or down.

articles.title: Spruce up your bland decking this summer with Lidl's £11.99 middle aisle gadget – & it's £55 cheaper than B&Q's version
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lidl has launched the Parkside 4V Cordless Rotary Tool for £11.99, suitable for garden DIY tasks. Additionally, Lidl introduced a £4.99 Parkside Smartphone Repair Set with 32 pieces for fixing smartphones, laptops and tablets. The company also released the Livarno Home Double TopCool Duvet for £10.99 designed to regulate moisture and body temperature.

articles.title: New BYD Dolphin
articles.author: Nepali Times
articles.summary: BYD is offering the new Dolphin 2025 in Nepal for Rs4.115 million. The Dolphin 2025 features a lighter Lithium low voltage battery, offering a 340km range and includes a six-year warranty and a 7kW charger.

articles.title: Foton Tunland G7
articles.author: Nepali Times
articles.summary: Foton is launching the Tunland G7 pickup, equipped with a 160 HP engine and 225mm clearance. The pickup is available in Elite (Rs5.19 million), Luxury (Rs6.54 million), and Flagship (Rs6.99 million) variants, offered in both 2WD and 4WD options.

articles.title: 'I tried the M&S strawberries and cream sandwich and I have one key thing to say'
articles.author: Brian Dillon
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has launched a limited-edition 'Red Diamond Strawberry & Creme Sandwich,' inspired by Japanese desserts, featuring strawberries, crème fraîche, and sweetened soft cheese in a brioche-style bun. The sandwich is available in the lunchtime sandwich section and is positioned as a 'game-changing' treat.

articles.title: Neal's Yard Remedies Unveils All-New Vegan Wild Rose Beauty Balm in Singapore
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: Neal's Yard Remedies has launched a new certified vegan version of its Wild Rose Beauty Balm in Singapore, featuring a blend of organic plant oils, butters, and waxes. The product is multi-functional, serving as a cleansing balm, hydrating mask, and more, and is packaged in recyclable materials. MUJI also launched a new skincare line in Singapore.

articles.title: Colorado's revived startup scene looks a lot like it did 20 years ago
articles.author: Tamara Chuang
articles.summary: Danny Newman led a group to crowdsource an idea and launch a new company called 'The Turdminator', an on-demand pet waste pickup service, using AI tools for market research, logo design, and web app development. The service was created in a single evening at a networking event and targeted Denver's busy professionals.

articles.title: Portugal Forward: The Symingtons: Rob, Charlotte and a matriarch
articles.author: James Mayor
articles.summary: Symington Family Estates, led by Rob and Charlotte Symington, has launched Matriarca in downtown Porto on June 20. This three-story townhouse features a wine bar, cellar shop, restaurant, cocktail bar, and wine academy, aiming to showcase Port and other wines in a modern environment. Matriarca reflects an Anglo-Portuguese sense of family and targets a "new" generation of Port drinkers, offering versatile and accessible Port experiences.

articles.title: 1000kW Concept AMG GT XX is our closest look yet at the performance division's new flagship
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Mercedes-AMG unveiled the Concept AMG GT XX, a preview of its new electric era featuring the AMG .EA high-performance architecture. This concept includes innovative axial flux motors, a high-voltage battery exceeding 800 volts with rapid charging capabilities (400km in 5 minutes), and targets a top speed of 360km/h.

articles.title: New EcoFood@Mandai Development Offers Tailored Food Factory Spaces in the North
articles.summary: EcoFood@Mandai has launched a new food factory hub called EcoFood@Mandai in Singapore's Mandai industrial zone. The hub offers purpose-built factory units for sale to food and beverage businesses, featuring customizable spaces for food production, processing, packaging, and storage, including commercial and cloud kitchen setups. The development aims to support Singapore's food resilience strategy.

articles.title: 'I ditched expensive body mists for retro £2 spritz and I'm never looking back'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: So...? has launched Red Velvet body spray, available for around £3.50 on Amazon and £2.50 in Wilko, with some scents being new and amazing and well worth a try. The Red Velvet spray is described as a sweet scent, with some similarity to YSL's Black Opium, and the Vanilla scent is strong.

articles.title: ElevenLabs Unveils Mobile App For AI Voice Generation
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: ElevenLabs has launched its official mobile application for iOS and Android, introducing AI-powered voice generation tools to mobile devices. The app integrates core TTS features, including the Eleven v3 model, and allows users to generate and export speech clips directly from their phones. This launch aims to empower content creators, marketers, educators, and voice professionals by providing greater accessibility and removing constraints from traditional workspaces.

articles.title: Best Samsung Phones 2025: Top 5 for Price & Quality
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch several Galaxy phones in 2025, including the S25 series with advanced camera and processing power, the Z Fold/Flip series with foldable technology, and the A series offering exceptional value. The Galaxy S25 Edge is anticipated with an ultra-thin design and promises an immersive user experience.

articles.title: Noctua NF-A12x25 G2 Review: Premium Fan Performance
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Noctua has introduced the A12x25 G2, a new PC cooling fan in the A12x25 series known for performance and quiet operation. Reviews highlight the fan's performance regarding airflow, static pressure, and low noise levels, setting a new standard in its class. The fan's design incorporates advancements leading to improved performance, lower noise, and enhanced durability compared to previous generations.

articles.title: The term "AI Transition (AX)" may sound unfamiliar. However, even at this moment, artificial intelli..
articles.summary: Netflix provides customized content based on viewing history using AI driven hyper-personalization. Starbucks recommends drinks based on weather, time and location with predictive services. Amazon increased sales by more than 35% with AI-based price adjustments.

articles.title: New! MG HS in any configuration you choose – Turbo petrol, hybrid, and PHEV
articles.author: IN COOPERATION WITH LUBINSKI
articles.summary: MG introduced a new generation of HS vehicles. The new MG HS offers drivers a choice between three different powertrains and more luxurious features.

articles.title: AWS launches innovation hub to supercharge cloud and AI innovation in Asia Pacific
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched the AWS Innovation Hub in Singapore, a facility showcasing cutting-edge technologies and partner solutions. The hub features innovations like an AI-powered farm-to-table system (Netatech) , a mini bike manufacturing line with AWS's E-bike Smart Factory, and Amazon Rufus, a generative AI-powered shopping assistant.

articles.title: Moto G96 5G mobile launch teased on Flipkart: What to expect from this budget phone
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch a new mobile phone in India. This follows the recent launch of the Motorola Edge 60. The new device appears to be part of the G-series lineup.

articles.title: Dangbei N2 Mini HD projector with AI setup now under £200
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Dangbei introduced the N2 Mini projector, a compact device featuring HD visuals, AI auto setup, and built-in streaming apps. It includes InstanPro AI Image Setup technology and is available with a discount on Amazon, priced at £169.15.

articles.title: ANTHBOT Showcases Genie Series Robot Lawn Mowers at SPOGA 2025, Redefining Intelligent Lawn Care
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: ANTHBOT is showcasing its Genie Series robot lawn mowers at SPOGA 2025. The Genie Series, launched in March 2025, offers features such as plug-and-play setup, full-band RTK combined with a 4-camera system, and a self-adjustable 5-blade cutting deck. The series consists of three models (Genie 600, 1000, 3000) and has achieved rapid market dominance, hitting No.1 on the Amazon US best seller list within one month of launch.

articles.title: Gillette Fusion5 Razor Review: Smooth Shave Guide
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The Gillette Fusion5 features a 5-blade shaving surface for even pressure distribution and a closer shave. It includes a precision trimmer for detailing edges and a lubrication strip for enhanced glide and reduced friction. The Gillette Fusion5 is designed for a comfortable and close shave, with features making it user-friendly.

articles.title: You can now build apps just by chatting with Claude
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched a new feature in its Claude AI chatbot, enabling users to create AI-powered applications directly within the platform. This feature allows users to describe the desired application, and Claude generates the necessary code. Applications created using this new feature can interact with Claude through an API and are available on all service tiers of Claude.

articles.title: A tin of baked beans could decide the fate of the LSE
articles.author: Simon Hunt
articles.summary: New Prince's Group, known for products like corned beef and Branston's baked beans, is planning a £700m float. The company, acquired by Newlat Food, generates nearly £2bn annually and is expected to become a stable part of the FTSE 250.

articles.title: LG Electronics Tests Glass Powder Detergent in Water-saving Project
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: LG Electronics is developing "Mineral Wash", a new functional material made of glass powder intended to replace surfactants in laundry detergent. LG Electronics, the National Water Industry Cluster Agency, and Korea Water Forum will measure water and electricity consumption when washing with mineral detergent containing Mineral Wash to verify the reduction effect in usage and assess the market potential. LG Electronics has filed 420 patents related to glass powder and has established production facilities with an annual capacity of 4,500 tons.

articles.title: Episoft Cleanser offers 1.9x hydration than marketed facewash: Glenmark
articles.author: Roshan Gupta
articles.summary: Glenmark's Episoft Cleansing Lotion, as shown in a clinical study, moisturizes dry, sensitive skin 1.9 times more effectively than a marketed face wash. This gentle cleanser also improves skin barrier function by 2.5 times compared to the same marketed face wash.

articles.title: LG Electronics launches Care, Eco System campaign
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched its AI-powered Eco System and Care campaign. This campaign aims to enhance customers' everyday living and home experiences through innovative technology.

articles.title: Jetour launches feature-packed X90 Plus SUV in Nigeria
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Jetour Nigeria has launched the X90 Plus, a new mid-size sport utility vehicle (SUV). The SUV is designed with premium comfort, cutting-edge technology, and powerful performance.

articles.title: Baby Essentials: White Noise & Wipe Warmers
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Tommee Tippee introduced Ollie Owl, a soft toy with crysensor technology that triggers comforting sounds when a baby cries. Leapfrog offers LF2936FHD, a video baby monitor, with a touchscreen parent unit and Baby Care+ app. Tapo provides connected LED bulbs for convenient lighting control. Braun's Thermoscan 7 thermometer is a reliable option for accurate temperature readings, including an app-connected version.

articles.title: HONOR X9c 5G Launch in India Expected During Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025; Check Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: HONOR is likely to launch the HONOR X9c 5G in India during the Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025. The phone boasts SGS 5-Star Drop Resistance, IP65 Water Resistance, Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 processor, a 108MP main camera with OIS, and a 6,600mAh battery, and an AMOLED display.

articles.title: I Already Liked Anker's 'Built for the Wild' Bluetooth Speaker, but It's a Bargain at 32% Off
articles.author: David Carnoy
articles.summary: Anker has launched the Soundcore Boom 3i, a Bluetooth speaker designed for outdoor use. It's waterproof, dust-resistant (IP68), and saltwater-resistant. The speaker floats and auto-corrects to keep the drivers facing upward. Anker is offering promotional discounts on the speaker.

articles.title: Young Aussie business owner breaks down in tears in the Coles carpark after 'devastating' find on shelves: 'I'm just so upset'
articles.author: ELISE WILSON
articles.summary: Gem has launched a new Skin-Loving Shaving Gel priced at $10 and available in Coles supermarkets. This product is being compared to S'haven Body's Whipped Shaving Foam, which retails for $39.95 and is sold online. Both products feature moisturizing ingredients and a pink hue, but they differ in price, availability, and specific ingredients, targeting different consumer segments.

articles.title: LG Electronics Tests Eco-Friendly ‘Mineral Wash' as Surfactant-Free Laundry Solution
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a pilot project for 'Mineral Wash,' a water-soluble glass powder designed as a low-carbon, water-saving alternative to laundry detergents. The company will collaborate with the National Water Industry Cluster and the Korea Water Forum to assess its effectiveness and environmental impact. LG anticipates expanding its presence in the laundry detergent ingredient market if the project is successful, and has already prepared production capabilities.

articles.title: ZATO Sparkling Wins Gold at Global Awards
articles.summary: Thai Beverage Public Company Limited has launched ZATO Sparkling, a new canned sparkling beverage that elevates traditional Thai rice wine fermentation. ZATO Sparkling is available in Cola Bomb and Lemon-Lime Fizz flavors, and recently won the Gold Medal in the RTD category at THE SPIRITS BUSINESS Awards 2025.

articles.title: Samsung 2025 Bespoke AI appliance range launched in India
articles.author: Anvinraj Valiyathara
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 Bespoke AI appliance series in India, including the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo that merges washing and drying and offers AI Wash & Dry features. Other products include the AI Refrigerator with AI Vision Inside, the WindFree Air Conditioner, and the Top Load Washer. These appliances are available through Samsung's website, exclusive stores, and major retail platforms.

articles.title: 41 Excellent Products To Add To Your Life
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. Veet launched sensitive hair removal gel formulated with aloe. Good Molecules released Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel with yerba mate and hyaluronic acid.

articles.title: Omnisend Launches AI-Powered Suite
articles.summary: Omnisend has launched a new AI-powered suite of tools designed to enhance email and SMS marketing for e-commerce businesses. This suite includes features like an AI Segment Builder, Personalized Product Recommender, and AI-driven content generation tools to streamline marketing efforts.

articles.title: AWS Launches Innovation Hub to Supercharge Cloud and AI Innovation in Asia Pacific
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched its first AWS Innovation Hub in Asia Pacific (APAC), located in Singapore. This hub provides an immersive experience for business leaders to interact with AWS and Amazon technologies, along with partner solutions. It offers a practical roadmap for digital transformation designed by Vision Builder, an AWS road-mapping solution powered by Amazon Nova.

articles.title: Yoshinoya to Offer Noodle Bowl in July; Move Is Aimed at Attracting More Female Customers
articles.author: The Yomiuri Shimbun
articles.summary: Yoshinoya Co. is launching a new product, the 'gyutama stamina mazesoba,' a dry noodle dish with beef and egg, on July 4 for a limited summer run. The company intends to broaden its customer base by offering a new menu item outside of their traditional beef bowls. The dish will be available at approximately 1,250 restaurants nationwide until August, with a target of selling 2 million servings.

articles.title: 30 Hidden Gems On Amazon You May Have Never Seen Before — Until Now
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for shine-free skin. Maybelline launched volumizing brow mousse for natural-looking brows. LoudCup unveiled a 20-ounce tumbler with a built-in stadium horn for game days.

articles.title: AWS Launches Innovation Hub to Supercharge Cloud and AI Innovation in Asia Pacific
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched its first AWS Innovation Hub in Asia Pacific, located in Singapore. The Hub showcases AWS and Amazon-wide technologies, partner solutions, and customer use cases. It also features new products like Amazon Rufus, a generative AI-powered expert shopping assistant, and GS DAP, a blockchain-based platform by Goldman Sachs.

articles.title: Limited time deal sees 'high power' Dyson vacuum price cut
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the Ball Animal UP32 Vacuum Cleaner at a discounted price of £179.99 on Amazon. The vacuum boasts enhanced cleaning capabilities, a larger bin, and tools specifically designed for homes with pets. Customer reviews on Amazon highlight its strong suction power and user-friendly design.

articles.title: I tried washing powders from every supermarket and one budget box made my clothes so fresh
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Aldi Almat Coconut Crush laundry powder, priced at £3.79, offers stain removal and is made with essential oils, providing freshness even on quick washes. Surf Tropical Lily Washing Powder provides a 'joy-infused fragrance' and offers '12 hours fragrance in wear'. Sainsbury's Tropical Escape Bio Laundry Powder, costing £4.75, promises an intense fragrance and effective cleaning.

articles.title: Born for Switch – AGI Technology Launches High-Speed microSD Express Card TF338
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: AGI has launched the TF338 microSD Express card, designed to support the new storage standard of Nintendo Switch 2. The TF338 uses the PCIe Gen3 x1 interface with NVMe protocol, offering up to 800MB/s read and 700MB/s write speeds. It is also backward compatible with UHS-I devices and is water, dust, shock, and temperature resistant.

articles.title: Neurizon creates liquid formula to improve accessibility of ALS treatment
articles.summary: Neurizon Therapeutics has developed a new oral liquid formulation of its NUZ-001 drug for Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS). The liquid formulation of NUZ-001 is expected to improve accessibility and ease of administration for ALS patients, supporting patients with all stages of the disease. The company plans to integrate the new formulation into its ongoing clinical development program for NUZ-001, with a human bioequivalence study scheduled to begin in H1 CY 2026.

articles.title: 30 Basic Clothing Pieces You Can Wear Every Day
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a wide variety of new clothing items. These include a buttery soft crewneck tee, a floor-length maxi skirt, a swing dress, a wide-leg jumpsuit, a classic V-neck top, a tiered maxi skirt, a waffle knit shacket, linen pants, a cropped tank, a sleeveless bodysuit, a lightweight long-sleeved UPF 50+ T-shirt, a drawstring romper, a V-neck tee, an off-shoulder maxi dress, baggy wide-leg Levi's jeans, a maxi dress featuring pockets, a padded tank, a tennis dress, a long-line padded tank, baggy jeans, a two-pack of crewneck tees, a pair of compression shorts, a twist-front crop top, a high-waisted wide-leg trouser, a sleeveless tee, high-waisted flare pants, a gauzy maxi button-up, and a high-neck bodycon dress.

articles.title: Chinese Smartphone Tops Longevity List
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: According to Yeni Akit's report, the [Insert Smartphone Model Name Here] smartphone model demonstrates remarkable performance and longevity compared to competitors. Key factors contributing to its durability include robust build quality, efficient battery management, optimized software with regular updates, and high-quality components. User reviews also suggest reliability and satisfaction with battery performance even after extended use.

articles.title: Doechii, Tyler, the Creator Debut 'Get Right': Watch
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Doechii and Tyler, the Creator are previewing something new.

articles.title: New Invention Allows People With Low Vision and the Elderly to Read Again
articles.author: Virtual Jerusalem
articles.summary: An entrepreneur from Jackson launched a groundbreaking new invention.

articles.title: These Soda-Inspired Hotel Suites Turn Nostalgia Into Immersive Design
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Olipop is partnering with Bunkhouse Hotels to create the 'Olipop Time Travel Travel Agency' experience at their Austin location. This involves transforming the Austin Motel into themed suites representing different decades to showcase Olipop's flavors, offering an immersive experience through July 8th. The suites such as the 1986 Cream Soda Suite, 1995 Strawberry Vanilla Suite, and 2002 Cherry Cola Suite evoke specific eras.

articles.title: Paramount+ Books Original U.K. Thriller Series ‘Baby Doll' Starring Alfie Allen, Jill Halfpenny (EXCLUSIVE)
articles.author: Variety
articles.summary: Paramount+ commissioned 'Baby Doll,' a new six-part original U.K. thriller series based on the novel by Hollie Overton. This represents an addition to Paramount+'s streaming content offerings.

articles.title: HCL Group and UpLink Launch Fourth Global Aquapreneur Innovation Challenge to Boost Water Resilience
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: John Dutton, Head of UpLink, announced the launch of the Aquapreneur Innovation Initiative Challenge. This initiative appears to be a new service or program offered by UpLink.

articles.title: Verizon Is Enlisting Google's AI to Resolve Support Calls on the First Try
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Verizon aims to revolutionize customer service quality. Verizon's consumer group CEO sees Google Gemini as the technology for this customer service revolution.

articles.title: Google Handoff could finally fix the Android experience across multiple devices
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google is testing a new feature called 'Google Handoff.' This feature aims to improve the connectivity between Android devices.

articles.title: Trump Mobile drops ‘Made in USA' smartphone claims from website
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Trump Organization introduced Trump Mobile, a new cellular service venture. The venture initially promised its first mobile handset, the T1 Phone, would be produced in the US.

articles.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Debuts Skincare: A ‘Jack Of All Trades' SPF
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The color cosmetics brand launched HydraPrime SPF 50, a new product designed to combat wrinkles, hyper-pigmentation, dryness, and texture. Claudia Soare claims the product aids in improving skin conditions.

articles.title: Shark AI Ultra Voice-Controlled Robot Vacuum for 50% Off, Now 3x Cheaper Than Dyson's Robot Vac
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: A new robot vacuum is available to assist with cleaning tasks.
